lessons.title: Lesson 1: Јас и ти
lessons.intro: Welcome to your first Macedonian lesson! You'll learn essential greetings like 'Здраво' (Hello) and 'Како си?' (How are you?), introduce yourself, and ask where someone is from. We'll cover the verb 'сум' (to be) and possessive pronouns.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Семејство
lessons.intro: In this lesson, you'll learn to talk about your family in Macedonian. Discover words for family members, practice numbers to discuss ages, and use possessive pronouns to say 'my mother' or 'his brother'. Perfect for sharing about the people closest to you.

lessons.title: Lesson 3: Прашуваме
lessons.intro: Learn the art of polite conversation! This lesson teaches you how to ask questions, get someone's attention with 'Извини' (Excuse me), and handle everyday situations like asking 'Is this seat free?' Great for navigating social interactions.

lessons.title: Lesson 4: Околу нас
lessons.intro: Explore the world around you with colors, objects, and locations. Learn to describe birthday gifts, identify everyday items, and ask 'Where is...?' This lesson builds your vocabulary for describing your surroundings.

lessons.title: Lesson 5: Има...
lessons.intro: Discover how to talk about places and locations. You'll learn to describe favorite spots, find differences between scenes, and use prepositions to say where things are. Essential vocabulary for describing spaces and giving directions.

lessons.title: Lesson 6: Твојот дом
lessons.intro: Make yourself at home with vocabulary for rooms, furniture, and addresses. Learn to describe your living space room by room, talk about what's in each room, and share your address. Perfect for housing and home life conversations.

lessons.title: Lesson 7: Што прават луѓето?
lessons.intro: What do people do in their free time? Learn verbs for daily activities, talk about hobbies with friends, and practice present tense conjugations. You'll be ready to discuss leisure activities and routines.

lessons.title: Lesson 8: Јадење и пиење
lessons.intro: Time to eat and drink! Master food and beverage vocabulary, learn to order at restaurants with 'Келнер!' (Waiter!), and discuss your favorite dishes. Essential for dining out and talking about meals.

lessons.title: Lesson 9: Дали...?
lessons.intro: Learn to ask yes/no questions with 'Дали...?' (Do you...?). This lesson covers professions, daily life questions, and how to have simple conversations about what people do. Great for getting to know others.

lessons.title: Lesson 10: Што купуваат луѓето?
lessons.intro: Go shopping in Macedonian! Learn vocabulary for markets, stores, and asking for directions to nearby places. You'll practice describing products, asking prices, and finding what you need around town.

lessons.title: Lesson 11: Што се случува?
lessons.intro: What's happening? Learn to describe current events and situations, check your progress, and ask questions about what's going on. This lesson focuses on present tense actions and situational vocabulary.

lessons.title: Lesson 12: Опишување луѓе
lessons.intro: Learn to describe people - their clothes, jobs, and appearance. From professional titles to physical descriptions, you'll gain the vocabulary to talk about the people you meet and see.

lessons.title: Lesson 13: Колку чини?
lessons.intro: How much does it cost? Master shopping vocabulary, create shopping lists, and learn to ask about prices. This practical lesson prepares you for real-world transactions and shopping conversations.

lessons.title: Lesson 14: Преку годината
lessons.intro: Journey through the year! Learn seasons, months, and festival vocabulary. From 'пролет' (spring) to 'зима' (winter), you'll be ready to discuss weather, holidays, and annual events.

lessons.title: Lesson 15: Во минатото 1
lessons.intro: Step into the past with your first lesson on past tense. Learn to use 'беше' (was) to tell bedtime stories and describe yesterday's events. Your gateway to narrating past experiences.

lessons.title: Lesson 16: Околу светот
lessons.intro: Travel around the world through language! Learn country names, nationalities, and map vocabulary. Discover how to talk about different places and the adjectives that describe them.

lessons.title: Lesson 17: Во минатото 2
lessons.intro: Continue your past tense journey with commands and descriptions. Learn to give simple instructions like 'Give me the book!' and describe people and situations from the past.
grammarCovers: Минато определено свршено време (Past Definite Tense)

lessons.title: Lesson 18: Како да стигнеш таму?
lessons.intro: Find your way! Learn directions, transportation vocabulary, and how to ask 'How do I get there?' From walking to work to navigating the city, this lesson gets you moving.

lessons.title: Lesson 19: Не смееш да го правиш тоа!
lessons.intro: Learn the rules with 'must' and 'must not'. Discuss weather, climate, and obligations. From traffic signs to social rules, understand how to express what's required or forbidden.
grammarCovers: Модални глаголи (Modal Verbs: смее, мора, треба)

lessons.title: Lesson 20: Тело
lessons.intro: Explore body vocabulary and health expressions. Learn body parts, discuss physical activities, and understand signs about what you must or must not do. Essential for health-related conversations.

lessons.title: Lesson 21: Добро, подобро, најдобро
lessons.intro: Good, better, best! Master comparative and superlative adjectives. Learn to compare things, express preferences, and describe the best places to live. Level up your descriptive abilities.

lessons.title: Lesson 22: Слободно време
lessons.intro: Dive deeper into free time activities. Compare different hobbies, discuss what's important to you, and use adjectives to express opinions about leisure activities and relationships.

lessons.title: Lesson 23: Идни планови
lessons.intro: Plan for the future! Learn to discuss upcoming plans, express intentions with future tense, and share your travel dreams. From Rome to your next adventure, start planning in Macedonian.

lessons.title: Lesson 24: Чувства
lessons.intro: Express your emotions! Learn vocabulary for feelings - from 'гладен' (hungry) to complex emotions. Discuss how situations make you feel and understand others' emotional expressions.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Кои сме – што сме
lessons.intro: Who are we and what do we do? This intermediate lesson dives into identity and nationality. Master present tense verbs, learn how Macedonian articles work (the unique post-positioned definite article), and form adjectives from place names.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Градот на мојата душа и душата на мојот град
lessons.intro: Explore cities and places close to your heart. Learn the 'да-construction' for expressing desires and intentions, ordinal numbers, and both direct and indirect object pronouns. Perfect for describing your favorite urban landscapes.

lessons.title: Lesson 3: Нејзиното височество – храната
lessons.intro: Her Majesty - Food! Advance your culinary vocabulary with imperative commands for recipes, past participles, and the conditional mood. From cooking instructions to restaurant recommendations, become fluent in food talk.

lessons.title: Lesson 4: Во светот на купувањето
lessons.intro: Enter the world of shopping with advanced past tenses. Master the imperfect for ongoing past actions, aorist for completed events, and verbal adjectives. Essential grammar for storytelling about shopping experiences.

lessons.title: Lesson 5: Професијата – сон или реалност
lessons.intro: Dream job or reality? Discuss professions and career paths using the perfect tense, adverbs, and particles. Learn to narrate your professional journey and talk about work experiences.

lessons.title: Lesson 6: Светот на дланка
lessons.intro: The world at your fingertips! Learn the past-future tense for reported speech, unreal conditionals for hypotheticals, and the 'има-construction'. Perfect for discussing travel, technology, and global topics.

lessons.title: Lesson 7: Празнуваме, одбележуваме, честитаме, подаруваме...
lessons.intro: Celebrate, commemorate, congratulate, and gift! Master conditional sentences, verbal adverbs, and passive constructions. Learn the language of holidays, traditions, and special occasions in Macedonia.

lessons.title: Lesson 8: Најди време!
lessons.intro: Find time for advanced grammar! Tackle the pluperfect tense for events before other past events, conjunctions for complex sentences, and reported speech. The capstone lesson for A2 proficiency.

lessons.title: Lesson 1: Дали се разбираме?
lessons.intro: Do we understand each other? This B1 lesson focuses on communication and comprehension. Learn the negative verb 'нема' (there isn't/don't have), expand your noun vocabulary, and refine your adjective usage for nuanced expression.

lessons.title: Lesson 2: Има ли надеж?
lessons.intro: Is there hope? Explore deeper topics of optimism, future outlook, and abstract concepts. Build advanced noun and pronoun skills for discussing complex ideas and emotional states.

lessons.title: Lesson 3: Моето здравје
lessons.intro: My health matters! Dive into comprehensive health vocabulary - symptoms, treatments, and wellness. Learn congratulatory expressions and medical terminology for healthcare conversations.

lessons.title: Lesson 4: Што (ќе) јадеме (денес)?
lessons.intro: What will we eat today? Advanced food discussions covering meal planning, dietary preferences, and culinary traditions. Master nouns, pronouns, and numbers in gastronomic contexts.

lessons.title: Lesson 5: Дајте музика!
lessons.intro: Let there be music! Express your passion for arts and entertainment. Learn conditional constructions with 'ако' (if), and vocabulary for discussing concerts, genres, and cultural events.

lessons.title: Lesson 6: Патуваме, сонуваме!
lessons.intro: We travel, we dream! Plan adventures and share travel stories. Master travel verbs, destination vocabulary, and descriptive language for recounting journeys and future trip plans.

lessons.title: Lesson 7: Луѓето се луѓе
lessons.intro: People are people - explore human nature and relationships. Deepen your use of the verb 'сум' in philosophical and social contexts. Discuss personality, behavior, and social dynamics.

lessons.title: Lesson 8: Градска џунгла
lessons.intro: Urban jungle - navigate city life with advanced vocabulary. From public transport to urban challenges, learn to discuss modern city living, infrastructure, and metropolitan culture.
